revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.5)
revision.text: {{WikiProject Business|class=C|priority=top|Accountancy=yes}} {{User:ClueBot III/ArchiveThis|archiveprefix=Talk:Auditor's report/Archives/|format=Y|age=26297|index=yes|archivebox=yes|box-advert=yes}} == Dubious == Per http://www.aicpa.org/InterestAreas/PeerReview/Resources/FAQs/DownloadableDocuments/qandaprp.pdf, the PRP is voluntary. That PDF indicates that SOME KIND of practice- monitoring program is required, so I think it's fair for us to say that. But to imply that the PRP itself, which is a voluntary program, addresses a concern seems inappropriate to me. I'm going to edit accordingly.--{{U|[[User:Elvey|Elvey]]}} ([[User talk:Elvey|t]]•[[Special:Contribs/Elvey|c]]) 17:51, 21 May 2014 (UTC) == Fixed garbled lede == The first few sentences were screwed up because someone had incompletely removed a parenthetical piece. A ]] from the wiki hyperlink syntax was visible in the article. I could make it shorter or try to restore the entire aside from version control, so I made it shorter. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/67.124.150.12|67.124.150.12]] ([[User talk:67.124.150.12#top|talk]]) 21:40, 5 October 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:5|one external link|5 external links}} on [[Auditor's report]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=745463136 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070127133416/http://www.investopedia.com:80/university/fundamentalanalysis/auditorsreport.asp to http://www.investopedia.com/university/fundamentalanalysis/auditorsreport.asp *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070127133416/http://www.investopedia.com:80/university/fundamentalanalysis/auditorsreport.asp to http://www.investopedia.com/university/fundamentalanalysis/auditorsreport.asp *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20130602180909/http://www.ey.com/Publication/vwLUAssets/Enhancing_transparency_of_the_audit_committee_auditor_oversight_process_November_2012_Point_of_view/$FILE/EY%20Point%20of%20view%20audit%20committees%20November%202012.pdf to http://www.ey.com/Publication/vwLUAssets/Enhancing_transparency_of_the_audit_committee_auditor_oversight_process_November_2012_Point_of_view/$FILE/EY%20Point%20of%20view%20audit%20committees%20November%202012.pdf *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20130615142119/http://taft.law.uc.edu/CCL/SOact/sec204.html to http://taft.law.uc.edu/CCL/SOact/sec204.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070126104457/http://www.pcaobus.org:80/Standards/Standards_and_Related_Rules/Auditing_Standard_No.2.aspx to http://www.pcaobus.org/Standards/Standards_and_Related_Rules/Auditing_Standard_No.2.aspx When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 08:26, 21 October 2016 (UTC)
